Containers.Name: PS3NetSrv
Containers.Overview: Run a PS3NetSrv Server [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/games[/b] This is where your games should be stored.[br][br] Port `38008` udp/tcp is default for PS3NetSrv.[br][br] When you add a "server" and [b]set the bind port to 0.0.0.0`[/b], until UnRAID supports ipv6.[br] [br][br] Submit any UnRaid issues here: [url]http://lime-technology.com/forum/index.php?topic=48370.0[/url][br][br] The docker container is made by [span style='color: #E80000;']shawly[/span]/ps3netsrv
Containers.Description: PS3netsrv is a program that allows Multiman or Webman to play game backups that are stored on your unRAID server.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
